title: Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber enjoy a romantic date night at Craig's
text:
They have been a power couple for more than 20 years, and have more recently become hosts of one of the hottest celebrity Halloween parties in Hollywood.

And Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber enjoyed some alone time before this year's spectacular as they headed out on a romantic date night at Craig's restaurant in West Hollywood on Thursday.

The supermodel, 53, looked elegant in a cream silk blazer and matching lace-trim cami, while businessman Rande, 57, chose a navy blue shirt and jeans.

Date night: Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber enjoyed some alone time before their annual Halloween party as they headed out to Craig's restaurant in West Hollywood on Thursday

The mother-of-two completed her outfit with black cigarette pants and added height to her frame with black strappy sandals.

Cindy accessorised with a patterned belt and dangling pendant necklace, while toting her belongings in a black leather handbag.

The couple looked very comfortable in each other's company as they walked arm in arm, before Rande drove them away.

They were in high spirits, with their appearance coming ahead of Rande and George Clooney's annual star-studded Casamigos Halloween party in Beverly Hills.

Chic: The supermodel, 53, looked elegant in a cream silk blazer and matching lace-trim cami, while businessman Rande, 57, chose a navy blue shirt and jeans

Supermodel strut: The mother-of-two completed her outfit with black cigarette pants and added height to her frame with black strappy sandals

Confident: Rande's simple look included a pair of Converse trainers and a smart watch

Last year, Rande and George wore pilot's uniforms at the bash, while Cindy posed as a retro air hostess.

The supermodel looked fabulous in a blue, white and orange shift dress with white calf high boots.

She upped the glamour with a dramatic winged eyeliner and a striking red lipstick, while a blue flight attendant hat sat atop her brunette tresses that had been styled into a glamorous bouffant.

Rande and Cindy have been married since 1998 and are parents to models Presley, 20, and Kaia, 18.

Ready to go home: The couple looked very comfortable in each other's company as they walked arm in arm before Rande drove them away

Gorgeous: Last year, Rande and Casamigos business partner George Clooney wore pilot's uniforms at the bash, wile Cindy posed as a retro air hostess

Cindy was one of the most famous models in the early '90s, alongside Kate Moss and Linda Evangelista.

Kaia has since taken on her mother's career, and is grateful for her influence.

While speaking at Vogue's Forces of Fashion panel, the teen acknowledge the guidance she's received.

'If anyone had a point of reference, I definitely did, and one of the best ones', she told Vogue.

'[It wasn't] a foreign world to go into. I felt like I understood it. I knew what I was kind of getting into. I'd been around it a lot.

'I definitely think there are some things that, no matter how much somebody can tell you about, there were a lot of things you do have to learn firsthand.'
